entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 near noon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Monday 02 January 2023
